description.S1: Maverick Johnston, a Byzantium film producer,
description.S2: thinks you've got the makings of a star!
description.S3: He invited you to audition for the lead role in his film.

blurb.B1: Accept Maverick Johnston's offer when he speaks to you on the street of Prosperity Plaza in Byzantium.

description.S1: Maverick said the audition would be held on the top floor of the Odeon Pictures building.

blurb.B1: Head to Odeon Pictures near the Bureau of Exploration in Byzantium,
blurb.B3: Use the intercom on the wall and speak to Maverick Johnston.
blurb.B4: He'll tell you that the other actors have real weapons,
blurb.B5: and you'll gain 9000 XP and the quest will update.

dialog.speaker: MaverickJohnston (Male)
dialog.utterance: Kid, you got presence. Natural magnetism. Know what I mean?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I like where this is going.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Whatever you're selling, I'm not buying.

dialog.speaker: MaverickJohnston (Male)
dialog.utterance: Tell you what, you're gonna like it a whole lot more once we start talking bits.

dialog.speaker: MaverickJohnston (Male)
dialog.utterance: Listen, you got an agent? Some kind of representation?

dialog.speaker: MaverickJohnston (Male)
dialog.utterance: Hey, don't worry about it. I'm gonna take good care of you.

dialog.speaker: MaverickJohnston (Male)
dialog.utterance: Listen, you got a real special quality. Raw energy. I see you in pictures, kid.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Just tell me what you're offering.

dialog.speaker: MaverickJohnston (Male)
dialog.utterance: I'm making a feature - "Space Pirates of Moros Prime." It's gonna be a hit, but we still need a star, and I think you got the chops.

dialog.speaker: MaverickJohnston (Male)
dialog.utterance: Terrific! We're holding auditions at the studio. Head to Odeon Pictures and take the elevator. You're going all the way to the top, baby.

dialog.speaker: MaverickJohnston (Male)
dialog.utterance: Fresh, natural talent! I know it when I see it.

dialog.speaker: MaverickJohnston (Male)
dialog.utterance: There's those street smarts! Just the right amount of rough-around-the-edges.

dialog.speaker: MaverickJohnston (Male)
dialog.utterance: Next time, we'll have you say that over the rim of a Tripistout. Product placement, baby!
